sentences.en: A Study on the Artistic Style in the Polyphony by Chen Mingzhi.
sentences.cn: 个性美感与音乐的整体美悦——论个性、特色与音乐作品表达的关系.

sentences.en: Before Louis Armstrong, solos were brief or non-existent, and the urgent sound of an old New Orleans jazz band came from the polyphony of players winding their melodies around each other.
sentences.cn: 在路易斯阿姆斯特朗之前，独奏是一种可有可无或完全不存在的表演形式，旧式奥尔良乐团中，各路乐手用不同的旋律共同交织出复调音乐，通常急促而又紧凑。

sentences.en: He preferred to write variation and polyphony, there can be found much fugue passage none.
sentences.cn: 他偏爱复调变奏手法和赋格段写作, 在他的多部交响乐中都留下了赋格段技法的典范.

sentences.en: This thesis employs Bakhtin's theory of polyphony to study the polyphonic features of Absalom, Absalom! "
sentences.cn: 本论文以巴赫金的复调理论探讨了《押沙龙, 押沙龙!

words.tran_cn: 多音的；有韵律变化的；对位法的

trans.tran_en: a type of music in which several different tunes or notes are sung or played together at the same time
